statements: SELECT * FROM OrderProcessingAlerts;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM OrderProcessingAlerts ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM OrderProcessingAlerts WHERE alert_level > 2;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM OrderProcessingAlerts WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM OrderProcessingAlerts;
SELECT * FROM OrderProcessingAlerts WHERE order_id = 12345;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM OrderProcessingAlerts WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM OrderProcessingAlerts WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT order_id, product_name, alert_level FROM OrderProcessingAlerts WHERE alert_level >= 2 ORDER BY alert_level DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM OrderProcessingAlerts WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM OrderProcessing ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT o_id, order_details FROM OrderProcessing WHERE order_status='Shipped'
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM StockAlerts WHERE stock_quantity < 10 ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC
SELECT o_id, order_details, order_status FROM OrderProcessing WHERE order_status='Pending' ORDER BY o_id
SELECT * FROM StockAlerts
SELECT * FROM OrderProcessing WHERE order_date = '2023-03-01';
SELECT o_id, order_status FROM OrderProcessing WHERE order_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM OrderProcessing WHERE order_status = 'Shipped' AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT o_id, order_details, order_status FROM OrderProcessing WHERE order_status IN ('Pending', 'Shipped') ORDER BY o_id ASC;
SELECT s_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM StockAlerts WHERE stock_quantity < alert_level * 2 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM OrderProcessing WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, product_id FROM OrderProcessing ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM ProductDetails WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM LowStockAlerts WHERE current_stock < threshold;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, quantity FROM OrderProcessing WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM OrderProcessing ORDER BY order_date DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, product_id, quantity FROM OrderProcessing WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' OR customer_name = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY customer_name, quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM ProductDetails WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, product_id, quantity FROM OrderProcessing JOIN LowStockAlerts ON OrderProcessing.product_id = LowStockAlerts.product_id WHERE LowStockAlerts.current_stock < LowStockAlerts.threshold ORDER BY quantity DESC, order_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, product_id, quantity, current_stock, threshold FROM OrderProcessing INNER JOIN LowStockAlerts ON OrderProcessing.product_id = LowStockAlerts.product_id INNER JOIN ProductDetails ON OrderProcessing.product_id = ProductDetails.product_id WHERE current_stock < threshold ORDER BY current_stock ASC, order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 10;
SELECT order_id, order_date, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date, products.product_name FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.order_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE products.category = 'Electronics'
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_type='Critical' ORDER BY alert_id ASC
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE customer_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_level FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 'xxxx'
SELECT product_name, price, stock_level FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT order_date, customer_id, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY order_date, customer_id
SELECT product_name, alert_type, message FROM products JOIN alerts ON products.product_id = alerts.product_id
